name: mist-ball
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: A mist-like flurry of down envelops and damages the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: A mist-like flurry of down envelops and damages the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.
